product_name: REI Grand Tour Travel Pack - Special Buy
long_description: The REI Grand Tour travel pack keeps you comfortable while traveling gear near and far. From luggage to backpack, the zip-away suspension system features adjustable torso length and padded shoulder straps, hipbelt and back panel. Panel-loading daypack zips on/off main pack easily; daypack's main compartment features a hydration pocket and hose port (reservoir not included). Daypack's front panel organizer includes pockets for cards, pens, electronics and keys; vertical zippered pocket provides additional storage. Travel pack's main compartment has a large zippered opening for easy access to the interior. Zippered bottom compartment provides extra storage for clothes and gear; adjustable divider creates a sleeping bag compartment. Locking zipper sliders on daypack and main travel pack let you secure your possessions (locks not included). Side mesh pockets hold 1-liter water bottles; top organizer pocket holds a few pens, spare change and other small essentials. Shoulder harness adjusts easily to fit those with torso lengths from 17 to 20 in.; padded hipbelt adjusts securely around hips. 2 aluminum stays create excellent load-bearing support. Exterior compression straps stabilize the load for jostle-free carrying. Zippered panel conceals the suspension system-great when checking the bag at the airport. Side and top foam handles; D-rings let you clip on a single shoulder strap (not included) for another carrying option. Daypack volume is 800 cu. in. (13 liters) and main bag volume is 3,400 cu. in. (55.5 liters,) for a total volume of 4,200 cu. in. (68.5 liters). Constructed of 420-denier nylon twill with 630-denier ballistic nylon on bottom for added sturdiness. Special buy.
short_description: The REI Grand Tour travel pack keeps you comfortable while traveling gear near and far.
